ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 21
ygData.msgSnippet: In regards to my last message about the blacksmithing guild on E ci. I m not sure why they re charging these insanely low prices.  My motto is if you aren t
ygData.messageBody:
In regards to my last message about the blacksmithing guild on E'ci.

I'm not sure why they're charging these insanely low prices. My motto is if
you aren't going to make a good profit.... don't make it. There is plenty
of people wanting to buy armor and you shouldn't just powersmith suits to
get to whatever skill making banded will take you. The thing that I'm told
what they're doing is they make hordes of banded tunics ... lately.... and
then sell them for 15 pp each to anyone that will buy them. So the most
expensive piece of armor is being sold dirt cheap. But I'm starting up a
smithing consortium on that server and so far have contacted about ten
smiths to get together and charge the same rates or near them on everything.

If anyone could tell me how I can build weapons it'd be appreciated thanks.
The weapons and armor guide I bought in Neriak seems to point out only the
banded mail smithing ingredients.

Also if there's any advanced guides or other ones that basic blacksmithing
and the armor and weapons guide I'd like to know where they are thanks =)
